statements: SELECT * FROM FraudDetection;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM FraudDetection;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM FraudDetection WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM FraudDetection WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM FraudDetection WHERE claim_amount <= 500;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM FraudDetection ORDER BY claim_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM FraudDetection WHERE claim_amount > 1000 AND claim_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM FraudDetection WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC
SELECT DISTINCT external_reference FROM FraudDetection WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_amount FROM FraudDetection WHERE external_reference IS NULL
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_id = 2;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM external_databases WHERE database_name LIKE '%customer%';
SELECT claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_status, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC;
SELECT database_id, database_name FROM external_databases WHERE database_url LIKE '%example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Claims
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM Claims
SELECT db_name, db_type, last_updated FROM ExternalDatabases
SELECT ref_id, claim_id, db_id, match_score FROM CrossReference
SELECT customer_id, is_fraud FROM Claims
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date, customer_id FROM Claims WHERE is_fraud = TRUE
SELECT db_name, db_type, last_updated FROM ExternalDatabases ORDER BY last_updated DESC
SELECT claim_id, customer_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount ASC
SELECT db_name, last_updated FROM ExternalDatabases WHERE db_type = 'SQL' AND last_updated >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT ref_id, claim_id, db_id, match_score FROM CrossReference WHERE match_score >= 0.75
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'pending';
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT detection_id, claim_id, database_id, detection_date FROM fraud_detection WHERE detection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT warning_id, detection_id, warning_message, warning_date FROM fraud_warnings WHERE warning_date < '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC, claim_amount ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_date ASC;

SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_amount, c.claim_date, w.warning_message FROM claims c INNER JOIN fraud_detection d ON c.claim_id = d.claim_id INNER JOIN fraud_warnings w ON d.detection_id = w.detection_id WHERE w.warning_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY w.warning_date DESC;

SELECT e.database_name, f.detection_date, c.claim_amount FROM external_databases e INNER JOIN fraud_detection f ON e.database_id = f.database_id INNER JOIN claims c ON f.claim_id = c.claim_id WHERE f.detection_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT c.claim_id, c.claim_amount, COUNT(w.warning_id) AS num_warnings FROM claims c LEFT JOIN fraud_detection d ON c.claim_id = d.claim_id LEFT JOIN fraud_warnings w ON d.detection_id = w.detection_id GROUP BY c.claim_id HAVING num_warnings > 0 ORDER BY num_warnings DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date FROM claims WHERE claim_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_claims WHERE detection_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, customer_id FROM claims WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT claim_id, detection_date, fraud_description FROM fraud_cases ORDER BY detection_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, fraudulent_amount FROM fraudulent_claims WHERE fraudulent_amount > 1000;
